alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 1:09PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of Cameron County through 200 PM CDT... At 108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms producing strong winds along a line extending from Arroyo City to 7 miles east of Rio Hondo High School to near Lozano to near Harlingen Soccer Complex to Yznaga. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harlingen, San Benito, La Feria, Los Fresnos, Rancho Viejo, Rio Hondo, Palm Valley, Los Indios, Southmost and Rangerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
